name: Jelly Delly
description:
Jelly Delly is a retro inspired, cartooney rhythm game, set in a charming yet funky universe. Play as a UFO that has to dance in order to get his food. Subvert capitalism with the power of music and rock our amongst the stars.

This game was part of the Comic Con Africa game jam. 

By: 

Joshua Jansen van Vuuren

Marco Prinsloo

Monique Butler

Deen Du Preez
